readable.title: 3121521593_18f0ec14f7
readable.content: A smiling girl in glasses and a blue-gray scarf with a smiling girl in a black coat leaning on her shoulder . A woman leaning her head on the shoulder of another woman . Two girls , one wearing glasses , dressed in cold weather clothing smile for the camera . Two warmly dress girls posing for a picture outdoors Two young woman hug and pose together for a picture .
